name: Task Force
overview: A top down turn based Laser Squad style wargame created by Mark Sheeky of Scorpius and released in 1993. You have to control your team, equip them with various weapons, etc. Allied agents descend into enemy territory, ready for action. Agent ADAMS scans the area ahead with his cyborg eye. An armed figure is located by the entrance to the enemy complex, take him out before he has a chance to react. Your squad steps over the dead guard and the task force enters the enemy complex anticipating strong resistance to follow...
